name: Sport Fishing: Catch a trophy
description:
FREE real fishing game designed to please amateurs and professional fishermen alike!

Dive into your favorite activity NOW - choose from a variety of rods, lures and reels to catch the biggest fish. Practice your skills and go fishing anywhere anytime!

SUPERB GRAPHICS:
•10 beautiful lakes with various climates, underwater landscapes and flora.
•Diverse conditions to make your experience more challenging and real - day/night shifts and weather changes such as rain, fog, sun and other.
•A sea of 3D fish with realistic behaviors. Test your skills and strategy thinking to see how big you can bait.

BIG VARIETY OF GEAR:
•Upgrade tackle to increase your chances of catching the legendary fish.
•Put your knowledge to test and play with various kinds of gear and lures to find a perfect combination for the biggest catch.
